collection_holder_name: Motion Picture, Sound, and Video Unit (Special Media Archives Services Division)
pageContext.collection_description: Briefly describes both government and privately produced sound recordings from a variety of sources, including radio broadcasts, speeches, interviews, documentaries, oral history and public information programs. The earliest recording is from 1896 but most recordings fall in the 1935-present time span. Titles are described numerically and by personal name reference.
